text: The World Inline Speed Skating Championships is the main inline speed skating championships in World for Juniors, organized by International Roller Sports Federation. ==Related pages== *World Seniors Inline Speed Skating Championships *European Inline Speed Skating Championships == References == * https://www.britishskatinglegends.com/seniorworldchampionships.htm * https://www.britishskatinglegends.com/juniorworldchampionships.htm * https://www.britishskatinglegends.com/senior-men-worlds * https://www.britishskatinglegends.com/senior-women-worlds * https://www.britishskatinglegends.com/junior-boys-worlds * https://www.britishskatinglegends.com/junior-girls-worlds * http://www.online- skating.com/articles-4066-2016-world-inline-speed-skating-championships- overall-nation-ranking.html == Other websites == * oficial Web of FIRS * https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inline-Speedskating-Junioren-Weltmeisterschaften Category:Inline speed skating competitions Category:World championships
title: World Juniors Inline Speed Skating Championships
